channel.title: please help me to verify whonix image
channel.description:
I followed this instruction. /wiki/KVM#Verify_the_Whonix_Images
but at 4. Verify the archive with Hulahoop's key. I had trouble. Whonix*.libvirt.xz.asc
then bash: Whonix*.libvirt.xz.asc: can't find the command
What should I install? I use Debian.

item.title: please help me to verify whonix image
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
using gpg --check-sigs… it will result in:

gpg: 2 good signatures
gpg: 1 signature not checked due to a missing key <- ?

Read full topic
item.source: please help me to verify whonix image

item.title: please help me to verify whonix image
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
at the moment this as well now not working cc @HulaHoop

maybe it should be Whonix-XFCE* ? not sure whats the problem but mostly by the names of the files something is wrong or so.

Read full topic

item.description:
Your advice solved it. Thank you.

item.title: please help me to verify whonix image
item.dc:creator: Lilias
item.description:
Hello.

It seems the documentation is missing the full command.

The command is: gpg --verify whonix*.libvirt.xz.asc whonix*.libvirt.xz

Read full topic
item.source: please help me to verify whonix image
